definition: to destroy property or hinder normal operations
details:
verb
- to destroy property or hinder normal operations
= synonyms: countermine
- to oppose and mitigate the effects of by contrary actions
= example: to oppose and mitigate the effects of by contrary actions
= synonyms: counterbalance
- to act in opposition to
= synonyms: antagonize, antagonise
- to oppose or check by a counteraction
= synonyms: countercheck
